project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Research and select a suitable public API for fetching weather data
Implement functionality to input a city name
Fetch the current weather data from the selected API for the given city
Parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the fetched data
Display the extracted weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each functionality above to ensure correct implementation
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
